docs.title: Yozara Financial Tracking Dashboard
docs.text: Welcome to Yozara, your all-in-one financial tracking dashboard designed to streamline your financial data, track spending, and optimize budgeting. Yozara empowers you to make data-driven decisions with real-time analytics and customizable dashboards.

docs.title: 📌 Get Started
docs.text:
• Learn how to set up Yozara in the Usage Guide.
  • View detailed updates in the Release Notes.

docs.title: 🚀 Core Features
docs.text:
• Real-Time Financial Tracking: Monitor expenses, income, and budgets in real time.
  • Custom Dashboards: Create and organize dashboards with widgets that matter to you.
  • Advanced Analytics: Visualize your spending habits, identify trends, and predict future costs.
  • Multi-Currency Support: Seamlessly switch between currencies for global financial insights.
  • Collaborative Sharing: Share financial dashboards with team members or clients securely.

docs.title: 💡 Need Help?
docs.text: Visit the Usage Guide to learn more about configuring Yozara to fit your financial tracking needs.

docs.title: Yozara Usage Guide
docs.text: This guide will walk you through the setup and configuration of Yozara, helping you unlock its full potential.

docs.title: 📌 1️⃣ Setting Up Yozara
docs.text:
1. Sign in to your Yozara account.
  2. Navigate to the Dashboard.
  3. Click Add Widget to start customizing your view.
  4. Select from options such as:
  5. Expense Tracker
  6. Income Overview
  7. Budget Planner
  8. Savings Goals

docs.title: 📌 2️⃣ Customizing Your Dashboard
docs.text:
• Drag and drop widgets to organize your view.
  • Resize and adjust widgets to prioritize key data.
  • Apply filters to narrow down data views.

docs.title: 📌 3️⃣ Generating Financial Reports
docs.text:
• Click Reports in the main navigation.
  • Choose a Date Range and Report Type.
  • Export reports as PDF, CSV, or Excel.

docs.title: 📌 4️⃣ Multi-Currency Support
docs.text:
• Navigate to Settings → Currency.
  • Choose your preferred currency for real-time conversion.

docs.title: 📌 5️⃣ Sharing Dashboards
docs.text:
• Click the Share icon on your dashboard.
  • Enter the recipient's email address.
  • Choose permission levels: View Only or Edit Access.

docs.title: 🔄 Troubleshooting & Support
docs.text: If you encounter issues or have questions, reach out to Yozara Support or visit our documentation for troubleshooting steps.

docs.title: Release Notes
docs.text: Welcome to the Release Notes archive. Select a date to view the detailed release updates.

docs.title: New Features
docs.text:
• Introduced Advanced Analytics Dashboard for real-time data monitoring.
  • Added Multi-Language Support for international users.

docs.title: Improvements
docs.text:
• Optimized search capabilities with faster indexing.
  • Enhanced UI/UX for smoother navigation.
